name: Bonus Actions
flavor: Some things simply don't take as long as using an attack.
text:
You have one Bonus Action per Round, which can be used to use a consumable item that isn't targeted on someone else, like eating a berry or consuming a type gem to boost the power of a move. Using a held berry still uses up the bonus action of your next turn.
An exception is the blast seed, which still uses a full action to consume. Because your mouth is too spicy afterward.
